document.forum_title: U.S. appeals court restores Brady's 'Deflategate' suspension
document.discussion_title: Donald Trump's rally in Rhode Island
document.topic_text: On Monday, April 25th, 2016, Donald Trump is holding a rally in Rhode Island on the eve of the primary voting in that state. This is the first rally Trump will hold since his rivals, Ted Cruz and John Kasich formed an alliance to attempt to get voters.
document.post: AND HE CAN TELL THAT TO THE AUSTRIANS ! - AND THE MARINES.
